alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Logan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 10:00PM CDT until June 03 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... Southeastern Logan County in west central Nebraska... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 1000 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles southwest of Stapleton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Gandy and Logan. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 233 and 245. Highway 83 between mile markers 94 and 110. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
